name: just another bad mobile game
description:
Hello, again, I am CactusCoder131 and the developer of this failure.

This is my very first mobile game and it let me know, that I don't want to be a mobile developer XD.

P.S: controls are, touch on the left side of the screen to rise up and press shoot to shoot. Simple.

P.P.S: if it doesn't start, press reset once.
